name: Moonlighter's Kill Will
description:
This is a bonus minigame set in Moonlighter's world. On this game you're not a shopkeeper who wants to become a hero. You're a strange creature, and you're attacking Rynoka!*

This game has been developed by some members of the team, it started as a joke during a break, but we feel that's fun enough to share it with you all :) Hope you enjoy it!

We want also celebrate the success of Moonlighter's Kickstarter campaign. In case you lost Moonlighter's campaign you can find it [here].

*not located on Moonlighter's actual timeline
